title.value: The black box of the relationship between breast cancer patients and accompanying patients: the accompanied patientsâ€™ point of view
title.justification: The title accurately reflects the core research focus of the relationship between breast cancer patients and accompanying patients from the patient's perspective.
title.quote: The aim of this paper is to evaluate, within the framework of two university medical centers, the perceptions of breast cancer patients who receive support from APs, particularly in terms of their active involvement in their care trajectory.

extractions.description: The study provides an evaluation of the PAROLE-Onco program in Quebec, focusing on integrating accompanying patients (APs), who are previously affected by cancer, into breast cancer clinical teams. Through interviews with breast cancer patients, the research highlights the benefits of including APs for enhanced emotional well-being, better communication, and patient empowerment in the treatment process.

type.justification: The study involves qualitative data collected from interviews with breast cancer patients, exploring their perceptions and experiences which categorize it as empirical research.
type.quote: Methods: A qualitative study including semi-structured interviews with accompanied patients was conducted between July and September 2022 in the two institutions that implemented PAROLE-Onco.

name.justification: The paper explores the integration of accompanying patients in the care trajectory of breast cancer patients, making it closely related to the field of oncology.
name.quote: This initiative is part of the PAROLE-Onco program (Patient AdvisoR, an Organizational resource as a Lever for an Enhanced Oncology patient experience), an organizational resource that acts as a lever to improve the experience of oncology patients and professionals.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the role of patient advisors and the patient experience in cancer care trajectory, fitting into the subfield of Patient Care.
name.quote: The results emphasized the added value of APs in complementing the support offered by healthcare professionals. Patients noted the critical role of APs in helping them navigate the healthcare system.
